data:
## function_Alert
> **Alert**(`props`): `Element`

Defined in: [react/bootstrap/src/components/alert/alert.tsx:52](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/863721bb9c0a8edf231e6372cee0ac10a1361a9b/react/bootstrap/src/components/alert/alert.tsx#L52)

Alert component that uses a forward ref to expose an API.

This component utilizes the useWidgetWithConfig hook to create an alert widget context
and the [useImperativeHandle](https://react.dev/reference/react/useImperativeHandle) hook to expose the widget's API via the ref.

### Parameters

#### props

[`Partial`](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/utility-types.html#partialtype)\<[`AlertProps`](#alertprops)\> & `object`

Partial properties of the AlertProps interface.

### Returns

`Element`

A JSX element that conditionally renders the AlertElement based on the widget's hidden state.

## interface_AlertApi
Defined in: react/bootstrap/src/components/alert/alert.gen.ts:215

Represents the API for an alert component.

### Methods

#### close

> **close**(): `void`

Defined in: react/bootstrap/src/components/alert/alert.gen.ts:220

Triggers alert closing programmatically (same as clicking on the close button (×)).

##### Returns

`void`

***

#### open

> **open**(): `void`

Defined in: react/bootstrap/src/components/alert/alert.gen.ts:226

Triggers the alert to be displayed for the user.

##### Returns

`void`

## function_AlertDefaultSlotStructure
> **AlertDefaultSlotStructure**(`slotContext`): `Element`

Defined in: [react/bootstrap/src/components/alert/alert.tsx:15](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/863721bb9c0a8edf231e6372cee0ac10a1361a9b/react/bootstrap/src/components/alert/alert.tsx#L15)

Renders the default slot structure for an alert component.

### Parameters

#### slotContext

[`AlertContext`](#alertcontext)

The context object containing state and API for the alert.

### Returns

`Element`

A JSX element representing the alert's body and an optional close button.

Represents the directives for an alert component.

### Properties

#### transitionDirective

> **transitionDirective**: [`Directive`](../../../../api/react/bootstrap/components/alert/../../types#directive)

Defined in: react/bootstrap/src/components/alert/alert.gen.ts:237

the transition directive, piloting what is the visual effect of going from hidden to visible

## interface_AlertProps
Defined in: react/bootstrap/src/components/alert/alert.gen.ts:83

Represents the properties for the Alert component.

### Properties

#### animated

> **animated**: `boolean`

Defined in: react/bootstrap/src/components/alert/alert.gen.ts:145

If `true`, alert closing will be animated.

Animation is triggered  when clicked on the close button (×),
via the `.close()` function or the visible prop is changed

##### Default Value

`true`

***

#### animatedOnInit

> **animatedOnInit**: `boolean`

Defined in: react/bootstrap/src/components/alert/alert.gen.ts:135

If `true`, alert opening will be animated.

Animation is triggered  when the `.open()` function is called
or the visible prop is changed

##### Default Value

`false`

***

#### ariaCloseButtonLabel

> **ariaCloseButtonLabel**: `string`

Defined in: react/bootstrap/src/components/alert/alert.gen.ts:168

Accessibility close button label

##### Default Value

`'Close'`

***

#### children

> **children**: [`SlotContent`](../../../../api/react/bootstrap/components/alert/../../types#slotcontent)\<[`AlertContext`](#alertcontext)\>

Defined in: react/bootstrap/src/components/alert/alert.gen.ts:185

Template for the alert content

***

#### className

> **className**: `string`

Defined in: react/bootstrap/src/components/alert/alert.gen.ts:175

CSS classes to be applied on the widget main container

##### Default Value

`''`

***

#### dismissible

> **dismissible**: `boolean`

Defined in: react/bootstrap/src/components/alert/alert.gen.ts:153

If `true`, alert can be dismissed by the user.
The close button (×) will be displayed and you can be notified of the event with the (close) output.

##### Default Value

`true`

***

#### onHidden

> **onHidden**: () => `void`

Defined in: react/bootstrap/src/components/alert/alert.gen.ts:113

Callback called when the alert is hidden.

##### Returns

`void`

##### Default Value

```ts
() => {}
```

***

#### onShown

> **onShown**: () => `void`

Defined in: react/bootstrap/src/components/alert/alert.gen.ts:124

Callback called when the alert is shown.

##### Returns

`void`

##### Default Value

```ts
() => {}
```

***

#### onVisibleChange

> **onVisibleChange**: (`visible`) => `void`

Defined in: react/bootstrap/src/components/alert/alert.gen.ts:102

Callback called when the alert visibility changed.

##### Parameters

###### visible

`boolean`

##### Returns

`void`

##### Default Value

```ts
() => {}
```

***

#### structure

> **structure**: [`SlotContent`](../../../../api/react/bootstrap/components/alert/../../types#slotcontent)\<[`AlertContext`](#alertcontext)\>

Defined in: react/bootstrap/src/components/alert/alert.gen.ts:180

Global template for the alert component

***

#### transition

> **transition**: [`TransitionFn`](../../../../api/react/bootstrap/components/alert/../../services/transitions/baseTransitions#transitionfn)

Defined in: react/bootstrap/src/components/alert/alert.gen.ts:92

The transition function will be executed when the alert is displayed or hidden.

Depending on the value of `animatedOnInit`, the animation can be optionally skipped during the showing process.

##### Default Value

`fadeTransition`

***

#### type

> **type**: `BSContextualClass`

Defined in: react/bootstrap/src/components/alert/alert.gen.ts:192

Type of the alert, following bootstrap types.

##### Default Value

`'primary'`

***

#### visible

> **visible**: `boolean`

Defined in: react/bootstrap/src/components/alert/alert.gen.ts:160

If `true` the alert is visible to the user

##### Default Value

`true`
